comment.author: 27236408@N00
comment._content: My 93 year old grandma is from the Kloostri (later Padise) municipality and she might be able to recognize the persons. Would it be possible to have the faces in higher resolution?

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/vahurpuik] It would be great if your grandmother could identify these women! I'll send you a file by mail, for her to look at. /Anna B.
